name: Fearless Rider
description:
Goal is simple : drive as fast as you can without hitting any obstacles or falling off the platform. Drive around in a buggy through challenging levels that involves blades, hammers, moving platforms and much more.

Avoid hitting obstacles



There are blades, hammers, shooting devices, hydraulic press, spinning wooden planks that you should stay away. Wooden planks will throw you away but everything else will kill you.

Keep track of time



Don't forget the goal. Drive as fast as you can, if you want to. Or else enjoy the journey. But if you want to challenge yourself, then try to finish faster than your current best time.

Don't fall off



Don't be in such a rush that you fall off the platform and sent back to the last checkpoint.
